#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
    int x; // store user input integer
    int zero;
    int multipleFive;
    while(cin >> x)
    {
        zero = 0;
        multipleFive = 5;//multiple of 5 method is used to find trailing zero
        while(x >= multipleFive) //Stop calculating when the multiple of is bigger than input integer
        {
            zero += x / multipleFive; //Add trailing zero
            multipleFive *= 5;
        }
        cout << zero << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
